item.description: Fragmented security solutions can create significant risks. item.title: Cisco Bolsters Security for Government With New FedRAMP Authorizations
item.description: Cisco has announced three new FedRAMP-authorized cloud security solutions designed for federal, state, and local agencies. These solutions respond to the growing need for secure, adaptable systems in complex digital environments. The new offerings include Cisco Secure Access for Government, Cisco Security Cloud Control for Government, and Cisco Multicloud Defense for Government. These tools aim to enhance security while supporting compliance and zero trust initiatives. As government agencies…

item.title: Wrangling the Wild West of MCP Servers
item.description: Ã°ÂŸÂšÂ€ Ready to build your own Model Context Protocol (MCP) server? In a recent article, Kareem Iskander explains how to leverage your existing APIs using OpenAPI specs. This approach allows you to create an AI-powered gateway for your product with minimal effort. Just a few lines of Python and a FastMCP wrapper can transform your APIs into role-based AI tools without the need for custom definitions. #MCPServer #OpenAPI #AI #APIs #TechTips
